name: RPPreviewViewController
desc: An object that displays a user interface where users preview and edit a screen recording that you create with ReplayKit.

items.name: var mode: RPPreviewViewControllerMode
items.desc: The type of screen that appears when the view is presented.

items.name: enum RPPreviewViewControllerMode
items.desc: The modes used to determine whether the preview view controller or the share screen appears when editing a replay.

items.name: protocol RPPreviewViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: The protocol you implement to respond to changes to a screen-recording user interface.
